text.section: An individual on mandatory supervision remains in legal custody until the expiration of the individual's full term.

An individual on mandatory supervision is subject to:
all laws, rules, regulations, and conditions that apply to parolees; and
any special conditions established by a commissioner.

If an inmate is convicted and sentenced to imprisonment for a crime committed while on mandatory supervision and the mandatory supervision is revoked, diminution credits that were awarded before the inmate's release on mandatory supervision may not be applied toward the inmate's term of confinement on return to the Division.
